pma:database.name: db_scriptforte
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `class` ( `class_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `class_staff` int(11) NOT NULL, `class_grade` int(2) NOT NULL, `class_section` char(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Class section per grade', PRIMARY KEY (`class_ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Collection of classes of the school';

CREATE TABLE `course` ( `course_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ID of the course', `course_staffAuthorID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the author from staffs table only', `course_name` char(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Name of the course', `course_type` char(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Type of course (quiz, pre-test, post-test)', `course_file` blob NOT NULL COMMENT 'Contains the text file of the course.', PRIMARY KEY (`course_id`), UNIQUE KEY `course_name` (`course_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Collection of courses with author and types.';

CREATE TABLE `staffs` ( `staff_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `staff_fname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `staff_mname` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `staff_lname` varchar(80) NOT NULL, `staff_birthdate` date NOT NULL, `staff_address` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `staff_organization` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `staff_position` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `staff_username` varchar(30) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Unique user names', `staff_password` char(60) NOT NULL, `staff_accountLevel` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`staff_ID`), UNIQUE KEY `staff_username` (`staff_username`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=32 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Composed of school''s staffs and teachers';

CREATE TABLE `students` ( `student_ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `student_fname` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `student_mname` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `student_lname` varchar(80) NOT NULL, `student_birthdate` date NOT NULL, `student_address` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `student_classID` int(11) NOT NULL, `student_username` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `student_password` char(60) NOT NULL, `student_accountLevel` int(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`student_ID`), UNIQUE KEY `student_username` (`student_username`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Registered students';

CREATE TABLE `student_performance` ( `pf_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'Student performance entry ID', `pf_studentID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the student', `pf_courseID` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ID of the course.', `pf_rating` int(3) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Student rating to the course.', PRIMARY KEY (`pf_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 COMMENT='Student performance after playing a course.';
